from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.types import *
account_name = "mdwohstorage"
container_name = "ingest"
relative_path = "FourthCoffee"
adls_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name, account_name, relative_path)

spark.conf.set("fs.azure.account.auth.type.%s.dfs.core.windows.net" %account_name, "SharedKey")
spark.conf.set("fs.azure.account.key.%s.dfs.core.windows.net" %account_name ,"wBfMysLe66697eGwWluZpRuNxIt8bjVhVa/794/03h+1LoEMfuvVDgsbNTJIlstSeLNumBY8hexq2PndX/BrUg==")

df1 = spark.read.option('header', 'true') \
                .option('delimiter', ',') \
                .csv(adls_path + '/Actors.csv')

df1.show()
